channel.title: Wifi on S. M. Nazmul Hasan
channel.description: Recent content in Wifi on S. M. Nazmul Hasan

item.title: How to Show WiFi Password in Windows
item.description: You have gone to a friends house and want to know his wifi password without asking him? If your friend has a windows pc and you have access to it for just 10 seconds then you are lucky. Wifi password showing tricks with windows cmd copy below code and paste it to a notepad and save it as a “Anything.cmd” file @echo off color 0a title Intel.dll netsh wlan show profile "YOUR_WIFI_SSID" key=clear >Pass.

item.title: How to Connect Wi Fi in Vanilla Arch
item.description: Connect wifi during installation wpa_supplicant -B -i wlan0 -c <(wpa_passphrase "ssid" "passphrase") Conntect WiFi on first boot N.B: Required Network Manager nmcli device wifi connect Your_SSID password Your_Password
